Boid - Class in <Unnamed>
A Boid object, subclass of the SwarmRobot class Based on algorithms described by Reynolds

BoidWithArrows - Class in <Unnamed>
A Boid object, subclass of the SwarmRobot class Based on algorithms described by Reynolds BoidWithArrows shows the direction the rules make the boid turn Seperation is shown with a green arrow Cohesion is shown with a red arrow Alignment is shown with a blue arrow
